name: The Ghost Haunted (Demo)
description:
The Ghost Haunted is a twist on the ghost haunting genre.
In this game, you are the ghost, and you are haunted.

You play as a young nameless specter in search of its memories.
But this basement is not the safest of the places.
No wonder you died.

Who knew ghosts could die again?

And again.

And Again...

======================================================

Made in Unity

Game Design, Art & Animation     |     Erick Vaghi

Sound Design and OST            |     Arvid Lundin

======================================================

This game was realized as a school summer project
